summary:
★	Entrepreneurial and analytical end2end Product Manager with 5 years experience spearheading cross-functional teams to drive the full agile product development lifecycle.
★	Delivered innovative products across industries; Telecommunications, Digital Banking and FinTech.
★	Developed a compelling product and brand strategy for mobile app in payments – Guavapay (Val. $ 52.5 Mln).
★	MBA’20 from the USA, France and Italy joint programme with 1st class honours.

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 35591351, 'name': 'GUAVAPAY', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQH5Qn-BIoRnGA/company-logo_400_400/0/1673273746657?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=CzMM42BZFtNlfWgIATLhHDpv-IZ1_9a0CX3bkunJTVg', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/guavapay/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'London', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'GUAVAPAY', 'description': '•	Conducted extensive research and analysis to discover a competitive landscape in the UK and European markets, gathering insights that informed product optimizations and improvements compliant with regulations.

•	Lead a cross-functional team, working on money transfer flows (FPS, SEPA, SWIFT), digital wallet, Apple Pay and Google Pay provisioning, e-commerce platform integration, settlement, and checkout in the UK and Europe, which 30% improved user experience and a 20% increased operational efficiency.

•	Lead a team with Engineers, UX/UI designer, QA, and BA to quickly define business and product requirements, delivering a product roadmap, GTM and MVP for a B2C and B2B payment mobile app. Which impacted with a 50% reduction in payment processing time and a 25% increase in transaction volume.

•	E2E ownership of products and APIs, from ideation and design to launch, growth, and maintenance, ensuring optimal user experience, operational efficiency, security, and compliance to regulations.

•	Worked with various POS systems, services and APIs that power E2E payment and platform experience successfully integrating them with B2B payment platforms such as Mastercard, Visa, streamlining payment processing and improving overall customer experience.', 'title': 'Product Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 266798, 'name': 'PASHA Bank OJSC', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGdGx9j9IHDYA/company-logo_400_400/0/1673851232619?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=FMW2DwjxEz6RQ7sv_86htue5Isr-Ftu3KBydUzohiAU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/pasha-bank/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'PASHA Bank OJSC', 'description': '•	Envisioned development of banking app resulting: 30% increase in revenue and 20% decrease in release time.

•	Proactively identified gaps and spearheaded project in lending process which led to a 1.5 Mln USD cost saving.

•	Built strategic vision, OKR’s and the long-term roadmap towards business deliverable in card payment and wallet.

•	Worked closely with strategic partners including Mastercard, Visa, Uber, Bolt, Wolt, strategic e-commerce platforms and local merchants to establish and deliver core product requirements and new products development.

•	Led “Branchless” strategy to increase customer service capacity resulted in 12% growth in happiness factor.

•	3X increased online credit requests by implementing the first-ever in-market ID&V tool, "SIMA”.

•	Led cross-functional teams through all stages of product development, offering business context and insights.

•	Spearheaded a squad to launch a new subscription tier for freelancers and small business owners resulted in a 25% increase in our subscriber base within the first six months, reducing the churn rate by 15%.', 'title': 'Product Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 399461, 'name': 'Nar (Azerfon)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFGKV8l8MIozQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1680169952867?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=ozV3ZoIFwbwQygg-FoZY0Tw_1N6nY3-e1vO-bfcvKls', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/narofficial/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Nar (Azerfon)', 'description': '•	Performed in-depth investigation on stakeholder collaboration process that identified an opportunity to automate manual processes and reduced "time to yes" by 50%. 
•       Led E2E development and launch of new products and services, collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive growth for a portfolio of products that generated 15% increase in active user base.
•	Conducted market analysis, identified customer needs, and developed product positioning and messaging that resulted in a 40% increase in customer acquisition.
•	Created marketing plans and campaigns, managed budgets, and tracked performance for multiple product launches including two-phase payments in bundles.
•	Analysed data and user feedback to optimize product features and customer experience, including launching new bundles for special needs, resulting in a 25% increase in customer satisfaction.
•	Developed relationships with strategic e-commerce platform and other strategic partners to drive business growth, resulting in a 10% increase in revenue from partnerships.', 'title': 'Product Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 5008309, 'name': 'ATL Tech', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQGro6_ywV5s4g/company-logo_400_400/0/1561721429931?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=lTMQLBD9zIPX__Ao8zm095Kyx-iQ_EeNl803lGaaK34', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/atltech/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'ATL Tech', 'description': '•	Led the development of platform in a cross-functional squad of 9 with 10+ stakeholders, resulting in a 30% increase in revenue and a 20% decrease in average release time.


•	Managed product backlog, defined product requirements and prioritized features for multiple product launches.

•	Coordinated with technology teams to ensure timely and high-quality product delivery.

•	Ensured product compliance with regulations and security standards for Payment and Wallet product launches.
•	Took full cycle ownership of SaaS products work from ideation, design, review and delivery.', 'title': 'Product Owner', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'ATL Tech', 'description': '•	Conducted market research, uncovering opportunities, and implemented product optimizations addressing customer pain points, resulting in 20% increase in revenue and customer base growth of 15%.

•	Managed project timelines and budgets, increasing ROI by 25%, developed and maintained customer analytics dashboards, helping stakeholders make data-driven decisions and leading to a 10% reduction in churn rate.', 'title': 'Business Development Analyst', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 38440, 'name': 'Azercell Telecom LLC', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGdDSYZk9o_HQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1674154954379?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=Nt6_FamhJwq0p8tzqUYldrZ6afjzRBq9TxAFUcb_S_U', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/azercell/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Azercell Telecom LLC', 'description': '•	Engaged directly with customers to understand their needs, collaborated on building new features, and incorporated their feedback into the product backlog to enhance the overall customer experience.
•	Conducted in-depth analysis of customer behaviour and usage patterns to derive actionable insights resulting in a 15% increase in customer retention rates and a 10% reduction in churn.
•	Developed and executed customer segmentation strategies, analysed customer feedback and identified key pain points, leading to a 30% improvement in customer satisfaction scores.
•	Developed and maintained customer analytics dashboards, providing real-time insights to key stakeholders.', 'title': 'Customer Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}]
